trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Castor
There were no other sightings in Castor on or around May 22nd 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsOn the evening of May 22, 2010 at approximately 10:30 p.m. I went outside to my backyard and sat down in my lawn chair to smoke a cigarette. The back of my house faces the south. I noticed two stars in the southern sky that seemed a little brighter than most of the other stars out that night. After a moment it occured to me that I had never seen these stars before and when I realized this I noticed that they were moving. At first I thought they might be aircraft or possibly satellites but I quickly discounted those possibilites because of the fast pace at which they were moving. One of the craft followed at a consistant interval and they were traveling from due south to due north one behind the other. When they passed a point that was just past overhead, they seemed to stop and accelerate away from the earth at a high rate of speed that caused their star-like appearance to fade away as the lights grew dim and they disappeared into space.
Summary: Two star-like craft traverse the night sky at atypical speed
